title: Valentine's Day from the Black Lagoon
description: Love strikes in the Black Lagoon! Everyone has to make a card for Valentine's Day. And even worse you have to give it to someone in your class. Plus, you can't draw a green-colored square or a dinosaur. You must draw a pink or red heart or a cupid. Yuck! You'd rather eat worms! And you know how it First you give a Valentine card and the next thing you know, you're married! You're just not ready for this!
author: Mike Thaler
